records.title: Opening Reception of Four Exhibitions
records.shortDescription:
Four Exhibitions opened on October 17, 2014.  Story Quilts by Marion Coleman; Landscape Revisited by Martin Weinstein, Sandra Gottlieb, Jonathan Beer (organized by Katharine T. Carter & Assoc.);  Looking Through to the Past by C.A. Fuhs, historical photos of Wichita … Continue reading →

The post Opening Reception of Four Exhibitions appeared first on Wichita Falls Museum of Art at MSU.

records.title: Outdoor Renovations
records.shortDescription:
Outdoor renovations are in progress.  Please excuse our mess. We apologize for the Closing of the Front Entrance temporarily.  Please use the WEST ENTRANCE until further notice.  The updates and addition outdoors will be worth the wait!

The post Outdoor Renovations appeared first on Wichita Falls Museum of Art at MSU.

records.title: Antiques Round Up 2014
records.shortDescription:
The WFMA at MSU held the first “Antiques Roundup” event Saturday, August 2nd.  The event brought out over 190 enthusiastic patrons excited to speak to the “Heritage Auctions” appraisers regarding their treasures!  Thank you to those who participated in this … Continue reading →

The post Antiques Round Up 2014 appeared first on Wichita Falls Museum of Art at MSU.
records.longDescription: The WFMA at MSU held the first “Antiques Roundup” event Saturday, August 2nd.  The event brought out over 190 enthusiastic patrons excited to speak to the “Heritage Auctions” appraisers regarding their treasures!  Thank you to those who participated in this event benefitting the Wichita Falls Museum of Art at MSU.   The post Antiques Round Up 2014 appeared first on Wichita Falls Museum of Art at MSU.

records.title: Quilting Wichita Falls Together
records.shortDescription:
The Wichita Falls Museum of Art at MSU received a generous grant from The Priddy Foundation. Together we will be creating a quilt of 300 squares that will tell the story of Wichita Falls. The deadline for completed quilt squares … Continue reading →

The post Quilting Wichita Falls Together appeared first on Wichita Falls Museum of Art at MSU.
records.longDescription: The Wichita Falls Museum of Art at MSU received a generous grant from The Priddy Foundation. Together we will be creating a quilt of 300 squares that will tell the story of Wichita Falls. The deadline for completed quilt squares for this project has come.  We are excited about the quilts that will be created!  After completed, the quilts will be displayed at locations around Wichita Falls.  The locations will be announced in the near future. A Sample of quilt squares we have received for this project. The post Quilting Wichita Falls Together appeared first on Wichita Falls Museum of Art at MSU.

records.title: 2014 Valentine Luncheon
records.shortDescription:
The 2014 Valentine Luncheon to benefit the WFMA at MSU was held February 7th in the newly renovated Event Hall in the museum. We welcomed 111 ladies for a lovely luncheon sponsored in part by … Continue reading →

The post 2014 Valentine Luncheon appeared first on Wichita Falls Museum of Art at MSU.
records.longDescription: The 2014 Valentine Luncheon to benefit the WFMA at MSU was held February 7th in the newly renovated Event Hall in the museum. We welcomed 111 ladies for a lovely luncheon sponsored in part by Neiman Marcus Downtown Dallas store. We were honored to welcome Mr. Jeffry Byron, the new General Manager of Neiman Marcus Downtown Dallas to our event this year. Thank you to those who sponsored and joined us for this wonderful annual event!   The post 2014 Valentine Luncheon appeared first on Wichita Falls Museum of Art at MSU.
